//VA A RECIBIR DIRECTAMENTE REVIEW DESDE SINGLECARD const Reviews = () => { //lo use despues const activesitems = review.slice(0, 2); const items = review.slice(2, review.length); return (

{activesitems[0].name}

{activesitems[0].review}

{items.map((coment, i) => (

{coment.name}

{coment.review}

))}
); }; export default Reviews;
